description: Inspired by our iconic sport coats, this jacket is made with recycled fibers and PrimaLoft® insulation to help keep you warm, dry, and comfortable while reducing environmental impact.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 30¾" front body length, a 30" back body length, a 19¼" shoulder, a 43¾" chest, and a 35½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Notch lapels. Buttoned throat latch. Suede collar stand. Three-button silhouette. Genuine horn buttons.
Four-button cuffs with suede trim. Suede elbow patches. Leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" shield patch with our signature Pony at the left sleeve.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist patch pockets with suede trim. Interior left waist pocket. Belt detail at the back waist. Double vent with concealed snapped closures. Fully lined and filled.
Shell: Made with recycled polyester, which helps reduce environmental impact by avoiding the use of virgin polyester, a petroleum-based material.
Fill: Made with PrimaLoft®, a recycled polyester fiber which maintains its loft and warmth without the bulk of down.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Lining: nylon. Exclusive of decoration. Dry clean by a leather specialist. Imported.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
